string.text: There should be an artifact around here somewhere...
Your belt can only hold one '%s'
Don't wear artifacts in your belt which add up to a combined fire protection greater than %4.2f%% - you may burn alive!
Don't wear artifacts in your belt which add up to a combined impact protection greater than %4.2f%% - you would die from internal organ hardening!
Don't wear artifacts in your belt which add up to a combined electric protection greater than %4.2f%% - the static discharges from them will kill you!
Don't wear artifacts in your belt which add up to a combined rupture protection greater than %4.2f%% - the stress will tear your muscles apart!
Don't wear artifacts in your belt which add up to a combined radiation protection greater than %4.2f%% - you'd be much more irradiated!
Don't wear artifacts in your belt which add up to a combined psychic protection greater than %4.2f%% - you could go insane!
Don't wear artifacts in your belt which add up to a combined protection against chemical burns greater than %4.2f%% - you would die from irreversible changes in blood composition!
Don't wear artifacts in your belt which add up to a combined explosion protection greater than %4.2f%% - you would die from internal organ hardening
Don't wear artifacts in your belt which add up to a combined firearms protection greater than %4.2f%% - you would die from internal organ hardening
This might be a mistake in the mod code, or from the game itself.
Anyway, you should inform the mod developers
Pack the crash log and dump file in an archive,
and report it, posting the archive on our forum
www.ogse.ru, in the crash topic, or on our moddb.
And most importantly; don't be nervous - all of this is fixable,
ATTENTION! FAILURE IN THE GAME! SEND A FULL LOG TO THE DEVELOPERS!!!
Attention, attention! From the %s comes %s! Everybody gets ready to fight! All soldiers take a position!
Attention, attention! In the %s we've discovered %s! Everybody in the area, help the Duty to destroy the mutants!
Attention! Failure in the delayed treatment of a corpse! Diagnostic message in the logs - save and exit the game, and send it to the devs.
One corpse more or less, who gives a shit?
Oh, Sidorovitch! Even though I did not kill him, you still owe me!
Now what, Barkeep? ---- Okay, fine, I'll go search the corpse. The info is burned on a flash drive? I'll PM you when I find something.
Fuck! And I thought we were settled...
Dang, we met just yesterday... Sorry kid...
Dammit! He was a good Stalker... I'll go get his PDA - and loot the remains while I'm there...
Well, here's another one leaving for a better world... Amen!
Ah shit, he owed me money.
One less Stalker, one more corpse.
I can smell bad shit going on...
For fuck's sake... They say it's safe there, safe!... I felt bad refusing to go with him on the last minute, but look at me - I'd be lying down next to him by now...
Yeah... Gotta walk for the loot now... Destiny...
What can I say?... The Zone ain't a place for Stalkers to stroll...
Just yesterday did we clean up that trail... Dammit...
He was a good guy, always shared loot when times were tight.. Rest in peace, brother.
Another one pushing into the Zone by himself, when will they understand?... Everyone knows not to go alone!
Sooo... Where is he ditched?... I have to save his coordinates....
Oh, Zone.. How many lives must you take before you're satisfied?
Oh, he was a good man. But maybe a bit too arrogant, and what a windbag..
Oooh... And he JUST promised me that barrel of his.. Guess I'm back to carrying stuff for Sidorovitch...
That's what I always said! Don't return the same way you went!
Bah! But was this not the Stalker that got wrecked at the bar yesterday?
Oh man, that would be evil of me to keep his stuff now. However, selling it to the barkeep...
On more soul lost to the Zone... How many more will it take away?
I have an anecdote for this occasion...
You died from the premature activation of the body-heat warmed artifact while taking it from your belt. Remember, artifacts can only be taken in your hands from the backpack!
Don't wear artifacts in your belt which add up to a combined %s protection exceeding %s - %s
you would die from the hardening of internal organs!
the static discharges from them will kill you!
the stress will tear your muscles apart!
you would die from irreversible changes in blood composition!
you would die from the hardening of internal organs!
you would die from the hardening of soft tissue!
Do not wear more than one top-grade artifacts from the same type on your belt - the interferences would kill you!
Do not wear over two powerful artifacts from the same type on your belt - the accumulation of side effects would kill you!
Do not wear over three ordinary artifacts from the same type on your belt - their combined actions would kill you!
Do not wear more than %s identical artifacts on your belt - your body couldn't handle that much!
Your score: %s. Opponent's score: %s. Money earned: %s
Your score: %s. Opponent's score: %s. Money earned: %s
Incorrect bet, or you don't have the money!
You got it wrong! Money lost: %s
There is no available\nslot for this add-on.
First, place the IDTC on the belt!
No therapeutic drug charges! Therapeutic subsystem disabled!
Therapeutic subsystem disabled by the user. Charges -
No stimulant charges! Stimulating subsystem disabled!
Stimulating subsystem disabled by the user. Charges -
No antirad charges! Anti-radiation subsystem disabled!
Anti-radiation subsystem disabled by the user. Charges -
Device is out of therapeutic drug charges! Therapeutic subsystem disabled.
Device is out of stimulant charges! Stimulant subsystem disabled.
Device is out of antirad charges! Anti-radiation subsystem disabled.
Warning! Long stay in a heightened radiation field!
WARNING! Long stay in a heightened radiation field! No anti-radiation drug available!
DANGER! Recieving high amount of radiation! No anti-radiation drug available!
%s All device subsystems reloaded and enabled. Each %d charges
!!! FIRE ON BOARD - LEAVE THE VEHICLE !!!
- ATTENTION - TARGET TOO CLOSE FOR GUN DEPRESSION -
- FIRE IN TURRET SECTOR - TRAVERSE MECHANISM FAILURE -

At the Cordon you can have a Goat. A GAZ-69, if you prefer. A bit old, but still going. You can have it for 9000 rubbles. Take it by the ATP garage. Money up front! That or you can take the Zapor near the penultimate house... granted it starts, hehehe!.. Hey but that one's FREE!
At the Garbage... Yeah... There's a M-412. It'll be abandoned by the parking lot. Meanwhile, perhaps, you could lend a hand there. You pay cash, as usual!
In the Garbage, I can hook you up with a UAZ. It will wait by the ruins, in front of the Duty checkpoint.
I can have you a Goat. It'll be near the railway tunnel.
There may still be a Niva. You'll find it... along the road after leaving the institute...
In the Dark Valley there's a "Loaf" you could drive. For 15000. It will be at the gas station, across from Borov's base.
At the Bar... At the Bar there is a Niva. By the roadside, opposite to the tanker.
At Yantar - the Humpback! Small and robust! All ready to go! Upon entering from the Valley, you can't miss it!
You want the Buggy? If so, then go ahead, get to the exit and take our masterpiece away. For 10000 - not free, of course. And I'll start making another one.
If you don't want the buggy, I can still adapt the Moskvitch. In the bloodsucker's village... Hunt some while you're there! Hehe!
At the Radar? There was a little something there... Who knows what's on the tray, but the car's yours. It'll drive you straight through the "Monolith" checkpoint. Full service, so to speak.
ATTENTION! GAME'S A-LIFE CRASHED!!! SEND A FULL LOG TO THE DEV TEAM!!!
You have acquired the Gatling gun M134, however, it should be obvious to anyone that without an exoskeleton one should not even try to fire it...

You attempted to pull on the second gasmask over the one you already wore, and even -somehow- managed to do it, but you can't breath through both masks simultaneously - you had difficulties pulling it off...
Medkits' effectiveness decreased to a critical level!
You can't use the same medkit twice!
You can't use a medkit with "Autodoctor" activated, because of possible overdose.
You can't re-use that drug because of possible overdose!
The drug is unefficient for active ailments! It is required that you take it in advance!
You can't sleep during a blow-out
You can't sleep during a psy-emission
You woke up with an acute feeling of danger
You can't sleep \nYour condition is deteriorating
You can't sleep when there are enemies nearby
You can't sleep in a car in the middle of the Zone - \nIt's unsafe
You can't sleep in the rain - \nfind a sheltered spot
This place is too dangerous to sleep
You can't sleep because of stimulants' actions
You can't sleep - \nyou will go mad
You can't sleep while you are zombified
Hm, something doesn't allow you to leave...
It is possible that the artifacts you found can't come out...
You should leave that artifact and go talk about this problem with Sakharov...
The AAA began its work. Do not dispose of the artifact!
All right, the AAA scanned the artifact - come back to me now, I must extract the data.
Marked One, the AAA didn't scan the artifact correctly - pick it up and try again!
Marked One, you alive? The AAA tracker showed that you were moving at a tremendous speed. Man I hope that it didn't really happen to you. Come now, I'm looking forward to it!
Marked One, hello! Here is a list of the necessary components for our research, as you requested: \n

Marked One! To Hell with that, this artifact, bring it later! Run to the trailer by the road, my boys need help there. Guess what, those morons shot at the helicopter, and now I'm receiving a SOS call! That's your job now, and be quick!
Marked One! Run to the trailer by the road, my boys need help there. Guess what, those morons shot at the helicopter, and now I'm receiving a SOS call! That's your job now, and be quick!
Well, Marked One, you've been useless. Either way, you passed the test, but now Wolf has lost his team, as you know. I'll be waiting for you now. That's all.
Marked One! Why the heck are my boys dying?
Great job, Marked One! Keep it up and you'll make a lot of friends. Come to me now, we've got some business to discuss.
Marked One, you shouldn't be far, look. Thanks for helping Tolik. You can come to the village whenever you want.
You can't do repairs \nwith enemies nearby
Waking up, you find a note in your hand, and an unusual artifact in your backpack.
Find the guitar in the beginners' village
Help the Freedom at the Radar
Everybody, stop running around and come here for a weapon.
Hey, Stalker, where are you going? Get out of here before we open fire!
He is doing something with the generator! Stop him!
It seems that the generator is running!
So, Marked One, you were able to record something? Come here, let's hear it.

Well done, Marked One, I never doubted you! The last thing is: these mercenaries that mined us, they're still alive, and we need to fix that quickly - for the future. Destroy them and I'll have a reward for you.
Yeah, that's Swede's PDA, good job! But where he is now, I wonder... Marked One, try to find my friend, he's probably in the Dark valley. Search his PDA, you might find something to help.
This freak is trying to save our prisoners! Undermine them, quick!
Meet with a detachment of the Duty
Well, without further ado, let us go already.
Money up front. We are businessmen, nothing personal. First the money, then the prisoner.
It seems you overshot with the payment.
What you think isn't our problem. If you want the prisoner for free, all you'll receive is a plastic bag with pieces of him inside.
Are you that stupid, you forgot who to contact? Let go of us immediately and get lost!
Clearly, talking business with you is bound to fail. Don't worry though, the following will be smarter. Team, shoot to kill!
Thanks for covering us, Stalker. Without you we'd be six feet under by now.
Attention, Stalkers! Barman talking. The circumstances are such that we are forced to turn off the Stalker network. The estimated interruption duration is of two days.
Marked One, thank you for bringing me here. Once I'm done deciphering the data, be sure I'll send you the results, in gratitude for saving me.

Lukash asks that you go search City-32 for one of the APCs from the lost expedition and deliver it to the barrier to enhance its protection. He promised an important reward. You'll most likely need to tinker with it for a bit, there's no telling what condition it may be in, and wether or not it will be possible to start it. The surviving members of the expedition tried to evacuate in a heavy transport copter, a "Chinook", but apparently they crashed. It should be worth looking for the wreck, since it might give you intel on the expedition's APCs. If you have technical questions, ask Screw.
Find at least one APC from the expedition
Drive the APC to the barrier
Electronic wireless key, allowing access to one of the "Ward"-class APCs.

To get inside a APC I need to find a key for it. Screw said the surviving expedition members tried to take a "Chinook", but that it crashed. Perhaps on the crash site there is someone from the APCs' crew, with a key on him. It would have survived a fall, with its impact-resistant and waterproof casing.

The inspection of the APC showed that the situation is far from the best - the vehicle is badly damaged, the fuel ran out, and there is no power. The battery is probably completely discharged. I have to talk to Screw about this. It's not clear what he can do, but in its current state this APC is definitely not going anywhere.
The most common lead-acid vehicle battery. This is what I have to bring to Screw, so that he can charge it, and we may then start the APC.
The most common lead-acid vehicle battery. Screw replaced an electrolyte and charged it up. Now it must be set in an APC.

The original battery does not seem to be restorable and I have to find a new one. Any ordinary lead-acid car battery would do the job. The best place to find one would be the Garbage, where there are plenty old cars, and certainly a battery in some of them. However, they will have spent twenty years there, so before anything else I'll have to bring it to Screw so he can give it fresh electrolyte, test it up, and charge it. Then I'll have to install it in the APC.
Marked One, are you around? You can pick up the battery, it's working, I checked it all up. The voltage should be good enough to run the APC.
It seems the APC's computer is faulty. In this state, it is clearly not suitable for battle. I must speak with Screw, it should be possible to fix it somehow.
Some rusty old computer in refractory housing.
This is a robotized fire module, eliminating the need to bring along an onboard shooter. Performs an autonomous control over the selection of targets and fire.

The APC's onboard computer is defective and must be replaced. Screw says that there are regular APC patrols near the military base in Agroprom. There certainly should be a spare part there. I'll have to search for it in the buildings near the garages. Also I remember that somewhere at Agroprom was ensign Zadov, haggling munitions. It is worth asking him, maybe he can get me a module without a fight.
Find and destroy the C-Consciousness main lab
Find out what is going on - Talk with the Dark Dealer

What the hell, where is the C-Consciousness? This has to be their lab. I have to figure out what's going on here. Maybe I should ask the Dark Dealer - he still remembers me as Strelok, perhaps this is something he'll clarify to me.
Prepare the assault on the C-Consciousness laboratory
Gather forces to storm the lab

I know the location of the C-Consciousness lab, but to go there alone would be suicide. It is certainly protected by the elite of the "Monolith", with the best equipment and weapons. I must speak with the head of every group, perhaps I'll be able to form a strike force that can distract the main protection force long enough for me to penetrate the complex.
Request the support of the Duty
Request the support of the Freedom
Request the support of the Army
%c[100,50,250,50]Wow, look who I see back online! Strelok, is that you? Alive? That can't be! Come see me if you're around. Catch the mark on your map.%c[default]
Less than half an hour before the emission!
is already loaded into the Bioradar!
GAME FILES MISSING! REINSTALL THE GAME!
"OGSE MOD ARCHIVES MISSING! RESET BASIC MODE PACKAGE!"
